definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

pinyin: zhong1 du4 xing4 fei4 shui3 zhong3

sentences.english: Maternal pulmonary oedema has been reported with tocolysis and fluid overload.
sentences.chinese: 資料顯示孕婦肺水腫並伴隨液體超負荷與安胎。

sentences.english: Result All patients were successful, 1 case had ever pulmonary edema.
sentences.chinese: 結果患者全部獲治成功，1例曾出現肺水腫。

sentences.english: High Altitude Pulmonary Edema(HAPE) is an altitude idiopathic disease which causes fatal risk.
sentences.chinese: 高原性肺水腫是一種具有致命危險的高原特發病。

sentences.english: Exposure to a high concentration of silane may result in delayed pulmonary edema.
sentences.chinese: 暴露於高濃度的硅烷會導致延遲的肺水腫。

sentences.english: When pulmonary capillary pressure is markedly elevated pulmonary edema ensues.
sentences.chinese: 當肺毛細血管壓力明顯升高時，就出現肺水腫。

sentences.english: Nitrogen dioxide and ozone may cause pulmonary edema .
sentences.chinese: 二氧化氮和臭氧可以引起肺水腫。

sentences.english: Anaphylactic and anaphylactoid reactions can be associated with bronchospasm and pulmonary edema.
sentences.chinese: 過敏及類過敏反應，可導致支氣管痙攣及肺水腫。

sentences.english: HF inhaled in high concentrations may cause glottitis (obstruction of the airway) and acute pulmonary edema.
sentences.chinese: 吸入高濃度HF會導致喉道阻塞和急性肺水腫。

sentences.english: Conclusion The study suggested that anisodamine might be an effective auxiliary medicine in treatment of HAPE.
sentences.chinese: 結論山莨菪鹼對高原肺水腫有明顯的輔助治療作用。
